entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
